channel.title: Two questions(item interface +dclaw)
channel.description:
First Question 1) Ok guys, i have dclaws Added In my server, and just today i added(tried) to add 4 hit spec. it kinda works but only one of the hits works like 0-0-18-0) eaach time. Anyone Help?
And Second Question 2)
For my item interface, i got all the things correct in Clientside, but idk if its correct on server side, so i was thinking if anyone could help me?

item.title: Two questions(item interface +dclaw)
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

Ok, so you have a bunch of spaghetti code, cool. What I want to know is what is the problem? What does not work with your code?

It’s like saying that you want help opening a mystery color airhead, when you want to know the color first. Well, you need to ask for help in opening the airhead to find out the color. Just a little analogy.

Read full topic

item.title: Two questions(item interface +dclaw)
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

Well, Where Do i add case 58253: showInterface(15106); sendMessage("If the character is not showing correctly, please logout and try again."); sendFrame126("Stab: +"+ playerBonus[0]+"",15113); sendFrame126("Slash: +"+ playerBonus[1]+"",15114); sendFrame126("Crush: +"+ playerBonus[2]+"",15115); sendFrame126("Mage: +"+ playerBonus[3]+"",15116); sendFrame126("Range: +"+ playerBonus[4]+"",15117); sendFrame126("Stab: +"+ playerBonus[5]+"",15118); sendFrame126("Slash: +"+ playerBonus[6]+"",15119); sendFrame126("Crush: +"+ playerBonus[7]+"",15120); sendFrame126("Mage: +"+ playerBonus[8]+"",15121); sendFrame126("Range: +"+ playerBonus[9]+"",15122); sendFrame126("Strength: +"+ playerBonus[10]+"",15123); sendFrame126("Prayer: +"+ playerBonus[11]+"",15124); break; case 59004: closeInterface(); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Two questions(item interface +dclaw)
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

  1. nono it hits only once, i tried like 50 times, only 1 time hit.

  2. my friend sent me this, but i got delta and i tried to find case 4140 but it wont work, so i think this is wat i need, but i need it to be for delta and where to put it

[code]k, in client.java, SERVER SIDE, search this.

“case 4140”

Directly above that case number, add this huge bit of code.

case 58253:
showInterface(15106);
sendMessage(“If the character is not showing correctly, please logout and try again.”);
sendFrame126(“Stab: +”+ playerBonus[0]+"",15113);
sendFrame126(“Slash: +”+ playerBonus[1]+"",15114);
sendFrame126(“Crush: +”+ playerBonus[2]+"",15115);
sendFrame126(“Mage: +”+ playerBonus[3]+"",15116);
sendFrame126(“Range: +”+ playerBonus[4]+"",15117);
sendFrame126(“Stab: +”+ playerBonus[5]+"",15118);
sendFrame126(“Slash: +”+ playerBonus[6]+"",15119);
sendFrame126(“Crush: +”+ playerBonus[7]+"",15120);
sendFrame126(“Mage: +”+ playerBonus[8]+"",15121);
sendFrame126(“Range: +”+ playerBonus[9]+"",15122);
sendFrame126(“Strength: +”+ playerBonus[10]+"",15123);
sendFrame126(“Prayer: +”+ playerBonus[11]+"",15124);
break;
case 59004:
closeInterface();
break;

That is the coding for the equip interface for normal based servers. (non delta etc.)[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Two questions(item interface +dclaw)
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

First Question 1)

It is a randomizer. It randomizes the hits you get. Give it some time, try it 3 times or more a day, and see if it changes. If it doesn’t, then that will need attending to.

Second Question 2)

Elaborate on what you need help on (Be specific). I would be glad to help, but I must understand the situation first.

Read full topic
